While storage belongs to archaic-inventions Communal granaries are a specific invention at the onset of the neolithic * 9500 BC stiltet granary ğ“Š˜ Jordan Dhra' & Karahan Tepe (AB) On raised poles for ventilation, dehydration and pest control Upper part built with sealed mud for cooling, dehydration and pest control Only accessible through adjecent special building in Karahan Tepe (ancient architects)?
